## R Markdown


Here I will show you the map of Beijing in China
```{r cars, echo = TRUE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles()
my_map <- my_map %>% addMarkers(lat = 39.9042, lng = 116.4074, popup = "Beijing")
my_map

```
